channel.title: Living Sports Analytics
channel.description: Latest sports analytics research papers, blog posts, and grey literature — curated and classified by AI

item.title: Ilia Malinin and the Curse of the American Olympic Coronation
item.description: Anointed as America's next Olympic icon, Malinin instead joined the long history of U.S. stars undone by the weight of expectation.
item.source: Neil Paine's Substack

item.description: International Journal of Sports Science & Coaching, Ahead of Print. item.source: International Journal of Sports Science & Coaching

item.title: Using transformer-based models for Vietnamese language detection
item.description: by Son Tran, Phuoc Tran This paper introduces a solution to the problem of detecting whether a sequence of text is Vietnamese based on its orthography and contextual features.
